article: u.s. intelligence officials on thursday were showing members of congress a videotape and other evidence supporting their case that syria was building a nuclear reactor with north korean assistance before it was bombed by israeli planes last year .
abstract: us congress gets video evidence of north korean link to bombed syrian facility
